title: Chocolate Chip and Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['125g plain flour', '45g unsweetened cocoa powder', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '170g unsalted butter', '130g peanut butter', '200g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '170g plain chocolate chips', '170g peanut butter chips']
